column4: how can I get amarok to import new music into my library? i was previously using iTunes, and it would organize the file structure in the form Artist/Album/TrackNo Track Name.mp3
If it's not copy protected, you can try the folder scan thing
it's un-drm'd, standard mp3. I guess what I'm looking for is something that will copy the files into the music library, renamed to the right format
I don't have amarok, but try the scanning functionh
